summ: manuj acquires axis bank credit card holder benefit by availing a emi on 35,000 at the rate of 3196 for 10 months. Interest are taxable, tax-inclusive processing charges of 300 on the first installment and pre-closure charges on the oustanding are applicable.
dialogue:
prashanth: welcome to celebal technologies ivr automation demo that i can help with bank related queries. hello. thank you for using axis bank credit card mr soumya. we are pleased to offer a special emi facility on your card so that you can convert your purchases. around 250000 into easy monthly installments and enjoy paying back and easy in settlements. please allow me to share the details on this emi offer.
manuj: sure, please go on.
prashanth: thank you so much, sir. i can see that you have recently done the transaction of 75,000 from flipkart on may 21st, 2021 through your credit card. you can instantly get this amount converted into emi. add an interest rate starting from 14% per annum. would you like to convert this into emi? manuj: yes, please go on.
prashanth: we have customize emi options available for you, which will be of 2777 monthly for the 10 years, 12 months. the emi monthly amount will consist of 18% plus tax on interest amount. should i proceed to book this emi? manuj: your interest rate is too high. prashanth: no problem, we can provide a special interest rate for you. according to new offer, the interest rate will be 16% and your monthly emi amount will be 1886 for the tenure of 18 months. would you like to email this emi option? manuj: no, this tenure period is too long. prashanth: that's no issue. we can change the tenure according to your needs. please let me know what tenure period are you looking for? manuj: the transaction amount 35,000? i want tenure period of 14 months only. prashanth: sure, we have just the best offer for 10 month tenure period. the interest rate application will be 14% and the monthly emi will be 3196 for the tenure period of 10 months. should i proceed booking the emi option? manuj: yes, please go ahead. prashanth: that's great. i believe we can share the charges and calculation of the monthly emi. let me once again confirm that you would like to convert your transaction of 40,000 for 10 years, 10 months. the interest rate is 14% per annum and will be charged on monthly balance plus tax applicable on interest amount. there is also a one time processing fee applicable which will be rupee. 300 including service tax. this pf plus your first emi will be included in your upcoming bill. your first month emi will be 3196. before proceeding with emi booking option, please confirm the pin code of your address. manuj: 302020. prashanth: thanks for confirming your pin code. please let me know what's your current credit limit is. manuj: 90,000. prashanth: thanks for confirming the details. your request has been captured and your transaction will get converted into emi within 2 working days. sir, you will get confirmation sms to your registered mobile number and you will also get a soft copy to your register email address which will have the emi breakup details. also let me inform you if you have availed any reward point on this particular transaction. it will be lapsed. if you want to pre close your emi then an individual transaction minimum 300 or 3% on remaining principal outstanding amount, whichever is higher applicable and tax will be applicable on pre closure charges. manuj: that's no issue. prashanth: you have unlocked a special credit card upgrade limit offer on your card. we will be happy to increase your credit limit from 80,000 to 150,000 after your confirmation. manuj: yes, i want the credit limit upgraded.
prashanth: congratulations, your credit limit is upgraded. you can now spend up down 150,000 on your credit card. thank you for your valuable time. keep banking with axis bank. manuj: i want to talk to an agent. prashanth: please wait while we are transferring this call to your agent.

prashanth: hi, i'm prashanth calling you from celebal tech bank. we have an emi offer specially created for you. would you like to know more about the offer? manuj:yes. prashanth: this call is being recorded by celebal tech bank. for security reasons, please do not share your cvv and otp with anyone. as i can see here, transaction of 57000 done on flipkart. would you like to convert this into emi? manuj:i want a loan instead. prashanth: what type of loan you required? manuj: can you repeat again? prashanth: sure,sir.what type of loan you required? manuj: car loan. prashanth: how much amount you will need for this loan? manuj: i didnt get you. can you repeat? prashanth: sure,sir. how much amount you will need for this loan manuj : i need about 7,00,000.
prashanth: i have locked your details. our customer representative will reach out to you soon. keep banking with celebal tech bank. manuj :thank you.

id: IVR Automation for EMI conversion with Live Transcript n Agent transfer
summ: manuj acquires celebal bank  credit card holder benefit by availing a emi on 30,000 at the rate of 3196 for 10 months. Interest are taxable, tax-inclusive processing charges of 300 on the first installment and pre-closure charges on the oustanding are applicable. manuj upgrades his credit card online transaction limit from 80,000 to 1,50,000. call transferred to human agent on user request.
dialogue: prashanth: thank you for using celebal bank credit card mr rahul. we are pleased to offer a special emi facility on your card so that you can convert your purchases. about 2500 into easy monthly installments and enjoy paying back and easy in settlements. please allow me to share the details on this emi offer. manuj: sure, please go ahead. prashanth: thank you so much, sir. i can see that you have recently done the transaction of 30,000 from amazon on may 21st, 2021 through your credit card. you can instantly get this amount converted into emi. add an interest rate starting from 14% per annum. would you like to convert this into emi? manuj: yes, please go ahead. prashanth: we have customize dmi options available for you, which will be of 2750 monthly for the 10 years, 12 months. the emi monthly amount will consist of 18% plus tax on interest amount. should i proceed to book this emi? manuj: no, your interest rate is too high. prashanth: no problem, we can provide a special interest rate for you. according to new offer, the interest rate will be 16% and your monthly emi amount will be 1886 for the tenure of 18 months. would you like to email this emi option? manuj: no, this tenure period is too long. prashanth: that's no issue. we can change the tenure according to your needs. please let me know what tenure period are you looking for? the transaction amount 30,000? manuj: i want tenure period of 14 months only. prashanth: sure, we have just the best offer for 10 month tenure period. the interest rate application will be 14% and the monthly emi will be 3196 for the tenure period of 10 months. should i proceed booking the emi option? manuj: yes, please go ahead. prashanth: that's great. i believe we can share the charges and calculation of the monthly emi. let me once again confirm that you would like to convert your transaction of 30,000 for 10 years, 10 months. the interest rate is 14% per annum and will be charged on monthly balance plus tax applicable on interest amount. there is also a one time processing fee applicable which will be rupee. 300 including service tax. this pr plus your first emi will be included in your upcoming bill. your first month i am. i will be 3196. before proceeding with emi booking option, please confirm the pin code of your address. manuj: 302020. prashanth: thanks for confirming your pin code. please let me know what's your current credit limit is. manuj: 80,000. prashanth: thanks for confirming the details. your request has been captured and your transaction will get converted into emi within 2 working days. sir, you will get confirmation sms to your registered mobile number and you will also get a soft copy to your register email address which will have the emi breakup details. also let me inform you if you have availed any reward point on this particular transaction. it will be lapsed. if you want to pre close your emi then an individual transaction minimum 300 or 3% on remaining principal outstanding amount, whichever is higher applicable and tax will be applicable on pre closure charges. manuj: that's no issue. prashanth: you have unlocked a special credit card upgrade limit offer on your card. we will be happy to increase your credit limit from 80,000 to 150,000 after your confirmation. manuj: yes, i want the credit limit upgraded. prashanth: congratulations, your credit limit is upgraded. you can now spend up down 150,000 on your credit card. thank you for your valuable time. keep banking with axis bank. manuj: i want to talk to an agent. prashanth: please wait while we are transferring this call to your agent.
